title: Apple and cinnamon cake
ingredients: ['3 large apples, such as Gala or Braeburn', '220g unsalted butter, softened', '220g granulated sugar', '2 tablespoons semi-skimmed or full fat milk', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '220g self-raising flour', '2 tablespoons ground almonds', '2 to 3 teaspoons ground cinnamon']
